verses.text_plain: Let Israel hope in the Lord: for with the Lord there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
verses.verse_html: 7Let Israel hope in the Lord: for with the Lord there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.

tokens.definition: יִשְׂרָאֵל Yisrâʼêl, yis-raw-ale'; from H8280 and H410 ; he will rule as God; Jisraël, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity:—Israel.
